Aliases for complex: Spt-Ada-Gcn5 acetyltransferase complex|ADA2-ADA3-CHD1-GCN5-ADA1-SGF11-SGF29-SGF73-ADA5-SPT3-SPT7-SPT8-SUS1-TAF10-TAF12-TAF5-TAF6-TAF9-TRA1-UBP8 complex|Something about silencing complex
Confidence: ECO:0005547(biological system reconstruction evidence based on inference from background scientific knowledge used in manual assertion)
Go Annotations: GO:0006357(regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter)|GO:0000124(SAGA complex)|GO:0004402(histone acetyltransferase activity)|GO:0016573(histone acetylation)|GO:0016578(histone deubiquitination)|GO:0004843(thiol-dependent ubiquitinyl hydrolase activity)
Description: A chromatin-acetylating transcription coactivator with histone acetyltransferase activity. Recruited to gene loci by the interaction of TRA1 with specific transcriptional activators, and the bromodomain of GCN5 binds acetylated H3 and H4 N-terminal tails which potentiates cooperative nucleosome acetylation of histone H3 catalysed by the acetylation module. This opens up the chromatin landscape for binding of additional transcription factors and the pre-initiation complex. In addition to promoting gene activation, a modified SAGA complex (CPX-675), apparently lacking SPT8, accompanies Pol II during elongation and functions to acetylate and subsequently evict nucleosomes from gene coding regions. The Dub module facilitates elongation through deubiquitination of H2B which allows for the recruitment of the CTK1 kinase (Q03957) and subsequent Ser-2 phosophorylation of the Pol II C-terminal domain
Complex properties: MW = 1.8 MDa. Modular in structure and has distinct functional units including a recruitment module (TRA1), an acetylation module (GCN5, ADA2, ADA3), a TBP interaction unit (SPT3, SPT8), a Dub module (UBP8, SUS1, SGF11 and SGF73) and an architecture unit (SPT7, SPT20, HFI1, TAF5, TAF-6, TAF-9 and TAF-12).

Aliases for complex: SALSA complex|SAGA variant complex|SAGA altered|Spt8 absent complex|SLIK|SLIK/SALSA complex
Confidence: ECO:0000353(physical interaction evidence used in manual assertion)
Go Annotations: GO:0046695(SLIK (SAGA-like) complex)|GO:0006357(regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II)|GO:0016573(histone acetylation)|GO:0004402(histone acetyltransferase activity)|GO:0005634(nucleus)
Description: Required for growth under stressful conditions to activate transcription of stress-responsive, Pol II-transcribed genes. Acetylates nucleosomal H3 and H2B. Plays a role in the yeast retrograde response pathway that is important for gene expression changes during mitochondrial dysfunction.
Complex properties: M.W. = 1.8 MDa. SALSA contains a C-terminally truncated SPT7.
